entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
